name: Code Report, LLC
description: Developer of AI-powered platform designed to offer screening development at scale. The company's tool assesses the professional readiness and potential of developers seeking admission into job openings, enabling clients to have automated reports for technical interviews.
one_liner: Developer of AI-powered platform designed to offer screening development at scale. The company's tool assesses the professional readiness and potential of developers seeking admission into job openings, enabling clients to have automated reports for technical interviews.
